section.heading: Procurement law inapplicable.
section.text: Chapter 3 of Title 2 shall not apply to contracts of the joint state oversight agency.

annotations.annotation: For temporary (90 days) repeal of this section, see § 4 of Washington Metrorail Safety Commission Board of Directors Appointment Emergency Amendment Act of 2018 (D.C. Act 22-238, Jan. 27, 2018, 65 DCR 819).
